COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Joe Charboneau
Debut game for Jerry Dybzinski

ej,grosw001,P,neudj901,Call at 3B ej,martb105,M,neudj901,Call at 3B $Freddie Patek slid into 3B as the throw arrived; Wayne Gross yelled at 3B umpire Jerry Neudecker about the call on Patek and was ejected by Neudecker; Athletics Manager Billy Martin argued the play and was ejected by Neudecker

appeal at 3B after John Montague entered; Knapp should get BFP, but our system won't permit one pitcher to get BFP and the other get 1/3 IP.  This answer gets IP credit correct and we live with the BFP error
$Larry Cox out on appeal for missing 3B
Debut game for Stan Cliburn
$Kirk Gibson out rounding bag too far
$Champ Summers called for interference with catcher
$Clint Hurdle called for interference
ej,freyj801,M,kaisk901,Interference non-call $Royals manager Frey ejected by 2B umpire Kaiser for arguing that interference should have been called at 2nd

umpchange,10,umphome,coont901 umpchange,10,ump3b,kaisk901 umpchange,10,ump2b,(None) $9 minute delay as HP umpire Shulock left game with chest pains from foul ball earlier in game; Cooney went behind plate, Kaiser moved from 2B to 3B and game was finished with 3 umpires
$Bert Campaneris called for interference
ej,bellb001,P,hallb901,Charging mound $Bell ejected by HP umpire Haller for charging mound after flying out; previous pitch was up and in
ej,babcb101,P,hallb901,Throwing behind batter after warning Bob Babcock ejected by HP umpire Bill Haller when his first pitch went behind Dan Ford's head
ej,grubj001,P,hallb901,Fighting Bruce Kison after HBP ej,kisob001,P,hallb901,Fighting Johnny Grubb after HBP Johnny Grubb charged the mound; he and Bruce Kison ejected by HP umpire Bill Haller
Protest=V
$Larry Harlow dropped the ball; Rich Dauer out for abandoning 1B (headed to dugout); Orioles manager Earl Weaver protested game
ej,lansc001,P,clara901,Call at 2B (Bumped umpire) Carney Lansford ejected by 2B umpire Al Clark for bumping him
ej,browb001,P,spenf901,Called third strike Bobby Brown ejected by HP umpire Fred Spenn
$Mike Torrez hurt his ankle on Fred Patek's hit
ej,fregj101,M,barnl901,Arguing before game began Angels Manager Jim Fregosi ejected by 2B umpire Larry Barnett during pregame meeting
$Dave Frost left with lower back muscle spasms
ej,mclic101,C,pales901,Unknown reason Brewers Coach Cal McLish ejected by 1B umpire Steve Palermo
$Intervening overthrow, so not a DP
ej,fregj101,M,morrd901,Call at 2B $Angels manager Fregosi ejected by 2B umpire Morrison for arguing Baylor was safe at 2nd
$Rod Carew scored during a rundown
ej,mattb101,M,koscg901,Call at 2B Blue Jays Manager Bobby Mattick ejected by 2B umpire Greg Kosc
$Ed Halicki left with sore right side
Debut game for Dan Whitmer
Bruce Bochte apparently injured on the play
$Don Baylor caught the ball over the fence
$Dave Stapleton's liner hit the 2B bag and caromed to Bobby Grich
$Vic Harris out at 3B to end inning before John Poff scored from 1B
